mapper.select: SELECT r.*, f.title, f.poster_path, u.nickname, u.profile_Photo_path FROM fm_review R INNER JOIN fm_film F ON (R.film_id=F.film_id) INNER JOIN fm_user u ON (R.writer=u.user_id) WHERE r.rno=#{rno} AND r.film_id=#{filmId}
SELECT rc.*, u.nickname, u.profile_photo_path FROM fm_review_comment rc INNER JOIN fm_user u ON rc.writer=u.user_id WHERE rno=#{rno} ORDER BY rc.insert_ts DESC
